trans-unit.source: Add a volume container
trans-unit.target: Add a volume container

trans-unit.source: Explains how you can use the StorSimple Manager service volume containers page to add a volume container.
trans-unit.target: Explains how you can use the StorSimple Manager service volume containers page to add a volume container.

trans-unit.source: To add a volume container
trans-unit.target: To add a volume container

trans-unit.source: On the Devices page, select the device, double-click it, and then click the Volume containers tab.
trans-unit.target: On the Devices page, select the device, double-click it, and then click the Volume containers tab.

trans-unit.source: Click Add at the bottom of the page.
trans-unit.target: Click Add at the bottom of the page.

trans-unit.source: In the Create volume container dialog box, do the following:
trans-unit.target: In the Create volume container dialog box, do the following:

trans-unit.source: Supply a unique Name for your volume container.
trans-unit.target: Supply a unique Name for your volume container.

trans-unit.source: This name can contain a maximum of 32 characters.
trans-unit.target: This name can contain a maximum of 32 characters.

trans-unit.source: Select a Storage Account to be associated with this volume container.
trans-unit.target: Select a Storage Account to be associated with this volume container.

trans-unit.source: You can choose from an existing storage account within the same subscription or select Add more to select a storage account from another subscription.
trans-unit.target: You can choose from an existing storage account within the same subscription or select Add more to select a storage account from another subscription.

trans-unit.source: You can also choose the storage account that was first generated when the service was created.
trans-unit.target: You can also choose the storage account that was first generated when the service was created.

trans-unit.source: Specify bandwidth as Unlimited if you want to consume all available bandwidth, or Custom to employ bandwidth controls.
trans-unit.target: Specify bandwidth as Unlimited if you want to consume all available bandwidth, or Custom to employ bandwidth controls.

trans-unit.source: For a custom bandwidth, supply a value between 1 and 1000 Mbps.
trans-unit.target: For a custom bandwidth, supply a value between 1 and 1000 Mbps.

trans-unit.source: To allocate bandwidth based on a schedule, you can Select a bandwidth template.
trans-unit.target: To allocate bandwidth based on a schedule, you can Select a bandwidth template.

trans-unit.source: We recommend that you keep Enable Cloud Storage Encryption selected to encrypt the data that is going to the cloud.
trans-unit.target: We recommend that you keep Enable Cloud Storage Encryption selected to encrypt the data that is going to the cloud.

trans-unit.source: Disable encryption only if you are employing other means to encrypt your data.
trans-unit.target: Disable encryption only if you are employing other means to encrypt your data.

trans-unit.source: Provide a Cloud Storage Encryption Key that contains between 8 and 32 characters.
trans-unit.target: Provide a Cloud Storage Encryption Key that contains between 8 and 32 characters.

trans-unit.source: The device uses this key to access the encrypted data.
trans-unit.target: The device uses this key to access the encrypted data.

trans-unit.source: In the Confirm Cloud Storage Encryption Key field, enter the cloud storage encryption key again to confirm it.
trans-unit.target: In the Confirm Cloud Storage Encryption Key field, enter the cloud storage encryption key again to confirm it.

trans-unit.source: Click the arrow to proceed to the next page.
trans-unit.target: Click the arrow to proceed to the next page.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Create volume container with bandwidth template 1</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Create volume container with bandwidth template 1</linkText>

trans-unit.source: If you specified Select a bandwidth template, choose from the drop-down list of existing bandwidth templates.
trans-unit.target: If you specified Select a bandwidth template, choose from the drop-down list of existing bandwidth templates.

trans-unit.source: Review the schedule settings and click the check icon <linkText>check icon</linkText>.
trans-unit.target: Review the schedule settings and click the check icon <linkText>check icon</linkText>.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Create volume container with bandwidth template 2</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Create volume container with bandwidth template 2</linkText>

trans-unit.source: The volume container will be saved and the newly created volume container will be listed on the Volume container page.
trans-unit.target: The volume container will be saved and the newly created volume container will be listed on the Volume container page.
